alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 10 at 8:38PM MDT until April 13 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MONDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...From Midnight Monday Night to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Expect difficult travel conditions due to snow, blowing snow and poor visibility. This includes the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. Cold, wet and windy weather will pose a significant threat to young livestock. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates late Monday night and Tuesday morning could exceed an inch per hour at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
